alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 9:58AM MDT until June 17 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Great Falls MT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Montana... Gallatin River near DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway affecting Gallatin County. Gallatin River at Logan affecting Gallatin County. .Heavy rain falling on a melting snowpack is causing rising river levels. For the Gallatin River...including DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway, Logan... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE FRIDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gallatin River at Logan. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.9 feet, water into USGS gage house. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 10.4 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.3 feet on 01/01/1980. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Monday morning.Monday morning at 1000 AM MDT.
